title: Is there an AI bubble? Financial institutions sound a warning
description: Lingering doubts about the economic promise of artificial intelligence technology are starting to get the attention of financial institutions that raised warning flags this week about an AI investment bubble.
content:
LONDON: Lingering doubts about the economic promise of artificial intelligence technology are starting to get the attention of financial institutions that raised warning flags this week about an AI investment bubble.

title: EU wants key sectors to use made-in-Europe AI
description: The EU on Wednesday told European businesses in critical sectors to ramp up their uptake of artificial intelligence and pushed for the bloc to cut its dependence on foreign AI providers.
content:

title: US approves some Nvidia UAE sales, Bloomberg News reports
description: America has approved billions of dollars in Nvidia chip exports to the United Arab Emirates. This is part of a bilateral artificial intelligence agreement. The deal will help the UAE build data centres for AI model development. The agreement allows for significant imports of advanced AI chips starting in 2025. This partnership strengthens US-UAE ties in the AI sector.
content:

title: generated content: political parties warned to comply with MCC guidelines
description: In a strong move to regulate the use of emerging technologies in elections, the Election Commission of India (ECI) today directed political parties to strictly adhere to the Model Code of Conduct (MCC) and relevant guidelines regarding the use of artificial intelligence (AI) for synthetic videos targeting rival parties or candidates.
content: In a strong move to regulate the use of emerging technologies in elections, the Election Commission of India (ECI) today directed political parties to strictly adhere to the Model Code of Conduct (MCC) and relevant guidelines regarding the use of art... [1453 chars]

title: US Greenlights Major Nvidia Chip Exports to UAE
description: The United States has approved billion-dollar Nvidia chip exports to the United Arab Emirates. The deal, part of a U.S.-UAE artificial intelligence partnership, aims to enhance UAE's data centers to develop AI models, allowing the import of 500,000 AI chips annually starting in 2025.
content:
The United States has authorized the export of several billion dollars' worth of Nvidia chips to the United Arab Emirates, according to a Bloomberg report on Wednesday.

title: China honing abilities for a possible future attack, Taiwan defence report warns
description: China has been using artificial intelligence tools to weaken Taiwan's cybersecurity. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:

title: Hollywood, Bollywood groups lobby Indian panel to protect content from AI models
description: Hollywood and Bollywood groups are lobbying an Indian panel for stricter copyright protection that will prevent artificial intelligence firms from using their intellectual property.
content:
Hollywood and Bollywood groups are lobbying an Indian panel for stricter copyright protection that will prevent artificial intelligence firms from using their intellectual property to train AI models, letters show.

title: India's fintech innovations set global benchmarks, says Kiya.ai CEO
description: India's growing leadership in digital finance and artificial intelligence is setting new benchmarks for innovation, said Rajesh Mirjankar, Managing Director and CEO of Kiya.ai.
content:
